website_summaries.verdict: The perfect combination of nourishing and appetizing, these crunchy squares are a meaty and naturally sourced treat that cats absolutely love.
pros: No corn, soy, wheat, or grain
Protein-rich, with added vitamins and minerals
Free of artificial preservatives, colors, or flavors
cons: No poultry-free version available for cats with food allergies
A little pricey for just 2 ounces

customer_reviews.title: All my cats quickly and enthusiastically gobble up these treats.
customer_reviews.text: I just want to say that all my feral cats, and my indoor cat, all highly recommend Blue Buffalo Wilderness Grain-Free Cat Treats. All the cats run right over to the treats when I toss them out, and crunch them up quickly. I can tell the cats love the treats, due to their enthusiasm, and how fast the treats disappear. I only wish the Blue Buffalo Wilderness Grain-Free Cat Treats lasted longer! Linda P.
customer_reviews.author: Linda P.

customer_reviews.title: Both of my kitty’s love these treats!!!
customer_reviews.text: After doing some looking into the temptation treats, I’ve decided to switch to better quality treats for my fur babies. I was surprised that both loved these treats and both loved all 3 flavors!!!
customer_reviews.author: Tmm

customer_reviews.title: All the cats love these treats!
customer_reviews.text: I have three cats of varying size, age and activity levels. Usually only the youngest one is into treats. The two older cats have turned their noses up at all others, but not these.They enjoy them. They are more expensive, but also seem to have better ingredients. Maybe my older cats are just more discerning of quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It looked like they mixed an older lot with a newer one
customer_reviews.text: The chicken flavored bag definitely had some quality issues. It looked like they mixed an older lot with a newer one. There was a clear distinction in color of the treats. While my cat was eating the light colored ones it didn't touch the darker ones. Although the best before date on the pack was 9 months out, it smelled definitely stale. I threw out the whole bag. The other two (trout, salmon) were fine.
customer_reviews.author: Hendrik S.

customer_reviews.title: My cat love these
customer_reviews.text: I have 2 ancient cats (16 and 18) that are still healthy, so I'm trying to feed them things that are as grain-free as possible. These are pricey but they love them. They are especially fond of the trout. I tried to find a big bag of just the trout flavor but couldn't find that....
customer_reviews.author: Hollybadger

customer_reviews.title: The healthy treat I've been looking for.
customer_reviews.text: My kitty loves her treats, but she upchucked the supermarket brands shortly after eating them. I tried a couple of other "healthy" brands with the same results. These are working, four days now with no problems. Miss kitty is a happy little girl.
customer_reviews.author: Realejude

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING QUALITY
customer_reviews.text: I have five cats and all of them loved all three flavors. I love this company and find it worth the cost due to the fact that I don't have to worry that my fur babies are eating harmful substances. They only use AMAZING INGREDIENTS and truly care about what goes into your pet. I wish I could give them 20 stairs because they deserve it.
customer_reviews.author: Victor Jake Molina

customer_reviews.title: YUMMY
customer_reviews.text: One of my cats is allergic to grain and I feel better knowing that even with treats I can give her a grain free option! Definitely recommend. Wide array of flavours. Yes the cats have fishy breath, but they always have fishy breath in my opinion lol
customer_reviews.author: Asha Moosai

customer_reviews.title: a vet recommended Blue Wilderness Dry Food for a finicky
customer_reviews.text: Several years ago, a vet recommended Blue Wilderness Dry Food for a finicky, little Deaf Cat who was suffering from end stage Renal Failure and was not eating much at all. He did eat the Blue Wilderness Food and I had two more years with my Beloved Seanduin!! Now I am dealing with an 11 year old female who is also finicky. She prefers Friskie's Crunchy Treats more than food, so I am hoping Blue Buffalo Wilderness will work. So far so good! snookiemc
customer_reviews.author: snookiemc

customer_reviews.title: 7/6/18 and one good one of 1/3/19
customer_reviews.text: This is the second time I have ordered these treats. Again, someone is not paying attention to stock rotation! Today's date is 6/11/18 and the "Best By" dates are...4/18/18,7/6/18 and one good one of 1/3/19. Wish there was some way to see the dates before they arrive.... not worth the hassle to return, but someone needs to get on the ball!!
customer_reviews.author: Bigblufan

customer_reviews.title: My cats devour these!
customer_reviews.text: I've tried other brands of crunchy cat treats that are also natural (or, at least, have ingredients that aren't so awful). But, my finicky cats only want these. When I open a new pack, they go bananas! They gobble these treats up like they're starving. It's great to find them in so many flavors here, as I have trouble sometimes finding them at local pet stores.
customer_reviews.author: Midwest Mama

customer_reviews.title: The Trout was awesome
customer_reviews.text: My cats loved these treats but something happened and my 3 cats won't eat them any more. So sad! I could get the cats to do lots for one of these. Sorry to not have these as ways to get my cats attention.
customer_reviews.author: Wisedup

customer_reviews.title: Cat goes crazy for these!
customer_reviews.text: My cat loves blue buffalo products, especially these treats. I have a treat ball I put a small amount in so he at least gets some exercise while he chows down! Love the ingredients.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lost interest quickly
customer_reviews.text: I think my kitten likes the bag more than the treats. She became uninterested in the treats pretty quickly. They somehow lost their charm after a few weeks, so ended up trying a different brand. The kitten food (not treats) is still great, though!
customer_reviews.author: Somebody

customer_reviews.title: will make your cat the wild lynx
customer_reviews.text: When the cat treats I was using (and my cat loved!) became hard to find, I needed to try something new. I saw this variety pack and thought it would be worth a try. Long story short, my cat LOVES all 3 flavors. Anytime I grab a aluminum pouch, he thinks he is getting a treat.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They won’t touch them
customer_reviews.text: I had great hopes for these treats, as I am trying to ease my cats off of Friskies treats. No luck. They won’t touch them. They just walk away.
customer_reviews.author: Foghorn Leghorn

customer_reviews.title: I feel good feeding my cat these treats!
customer_reviews.text: My cat goes crazy for their crunchy treats! What can I say more than that? Well - I can say more -- Blue Buffalo uses quality ingredients & I feel good feeding my cat these treats!
customer_reviews.author: Kat M

customer_reviews.title: Inconsistent Quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought one package of the chicken flavor and the cats loved it. They liked the light crispy texture and the taste. The next two purchases were hard as little rocks and smelled stronger. They wouldn't eat them.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan Toth

customer_reviews.title: Great treat for cats
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product. The fact that it is grain free is the best thing about this, especially when one lives with a cat whose diet is grain free.
customer_reviews.author: Virginia Hunt

customer_reviews.title: two of cats love them!
customer_reviews.text: as simple as that. my cats loved them. they go nuts over it. I recommend blue buffalo products
customer_reviews.author: bktiger86

customer_reviews.title: Get them for your kitty!!
customer_reviews.text: My cat will wake me up in the middle of the night for these!!! She LOVES them! She is allergic to grain and will break out in rashes all over her body if she eats any, but these, grain-free treats are amazing! 10/10 recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Kbrunoooo

customer_reviews.title: Cat loves it
customer_reviews.text: Cat is crazy for these treats, so much so I have to be careful to not overfeed. Switched her to a grain free diet and now she's no longer throwing up after eating. I guess cats get reflux too
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cats love then
customer_reviews.text: Cat really loves the treats. They are small bites for the older cat without many teeth and perfect for the other cats to chew and they really go for them. Wish they had bigger bags.
customer_reviews.author: Connie

customer_reviews.title: Loved them
customer_reviews.text: As soon as I opened them and put them in front of my little girl she was thrilled. Chewed them right up. Can't wait to try all four flavors.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Gurrola

customer_reviews.title: My kitties love them
customer_reviews.text: Was pleased at how fast the delivery came. Product is great.
customer_reviews.author: blue parrot

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Cats loved these treats. Wish they came in larger quantities for cheaper price!
customer_reviews.author: Jack

customer_reviews.title: My Cat Says A+
customer_reviews.text: These are my cat's absolute favorite treats. His little mouth waters as soon as he sees the bag. Easy to understand ingredients. Definitely recommend, especially if your cat loves Blue Wilderness dry food and crunchy stuff.
customer_reviews.author: J.A. Steckling

customer_reviews.title: My cat loves these treats
customer_reviews.text: My cat loves these healthy snacks. Actually stands by the drawer I leave them at and cries for them
customer_reviews.author: Felicia Frestan

customer_reviews.title: Chomp chomp chomp
customer_reviews.text: My cats thought these were me just throwing regular cat food as treats - WHOAH were they surprised!!! They both looked at me like - what the what? CHOMP CHOMP CHOMP
customer_reviews.author: drpicard

customer_reviews.title: ... varieties of treats I already had for her were boring her (rude)
customer_reviews.text: My cat stopped taking treats from me - I guess the four varieties of treats I already had for her were boring her (rude). These won her back, though - she loves them!
customer_reviews.author: Bex

customer_reviews.title: Cat won't eat
customer_reviews.text: My cat will not eat these - and he is not normally a "picky" eater!
customer_reviews.author: in-tegrity

customer_reviews.title: Cat treats
customer_reviews.text: Cat loves the crunchy type but not the soft treats. Fussy.
customer_reviews.author: Corvettelen

customer_reviews.title: The best grain free cat treats around !
customer_reviews.text: Cats love these treats and be ready for a pounce when they hear the bag crinkle I highly recommend these cat treats high quality at a great price with variety.
customer_reviews.author: SAVY BUYER

customer_reviews.title: My cat loves these treats
customer_reviews.text: My cat is a picky eater but He loves these crunchy treats
customer_reviews.author: hanah

customer_reviews.title: The cats love it.
customer_reviews.text: My cats can't get enough, I will definitely buy this for years to come.
customer_reviews.author: Saintmom

customer_reviews.title: My Cat's Favorite Treats!
customer_reviews.text: I supplement my cat's diet with these healthy treats and they are her favorite food in the world. Give them a try!
customer_reviews.author: Andrew May

customer_reviews.title: Quality cat treat
customer_reviews.text: My cat LOVES them! We use them for treat fetch and she goobles them up like nobodies business.
customer_reviews.author: Sadie Knutson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Actually I'm indifferent to it but the cats love it and that's all that counts!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Even picky cats love them!
customer_reviews.text: I have two cats with very different opinions regarding their food. But both of my cats LOVE these Blue Buffalo treats. I put them in their food dish every day and they can't wait to get more. Very happy with these treats overall.
customer_reviews.author: Tasha

customer_reviews.title: Cats love them!
customer_reviews.text: I have 4 cats that are very finicky. All of them have their own favorite flavor or combination. I'm thrilled!
customer_reviews.author: Lady Phoenix

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My 3 picky cats love this brand and these flavors. Hard to find in stores.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: EVERYBODY needs a treat
customer_reviews.text: One of my five cats is diabetic. He feels left out when everyone gets treats. The vet says grain free is okay in moderation. These are not cheap, but they assuage my guilt.
customer_reviews.author: Mother of cats.

customer_reviews.title: I knew that it was a great value. Please don't discontinue this offer
customer_reviews.text: My cat absolutely loves Blue Buffalo Wilderness treats! When I saw this bundle package offer for the price, I knew that it was a great value. Please don't discontinue this offer.
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: all three cats loved these for a change from kittles, their usual. :)
customer_reviews.author: G-Unit

customer_reviews.title: Seemed like a good idea
customer_reviews.text: My cat doesn't really like them, which is disappointing. I think I can pawn them off on a neighbor's cats. They eat anything!!
customer_reviews.author: Annika P.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Kitty thinks these are the best and I like the healthy ingredients and reasonable price
customer_reviews.author: J. Salvi

customer_reviews.title: Great Intredients
customer_reviews.text: It has very good natural ingredients in it. Bottom line my cat love these treats..
customer_reviews.author: George E Danshaw

customer_reviews.title: Love these healthy treats for my cat and I love ...
customer_reviews.text: Love these healthy treats for my cat and I love that I can order online and have delivered! Great value!
customer_reviews.author: Birdland23

customer_reviews.title: Expired
customer_reviews.text: One of the packs was expired and the other is expiring next month.
customer_reviews.author: Mario

customer_reviews.title: these treats are awesome. No hairball problems any more
customer_reviews.text: My Maine coon cat would always spit up hairball, these treats are awesome. No hairball problems any more.. I Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Debbie P.

customer_reviews.title: Kitties love em!
customer_reviews.text: A healthy snack for my kitties and they both love all the flavors!!
customer_reviews.author: C. E. S.

customer_reviews.title: Luv em
customer_reviews.text: Our cat loves these. Wanted to get away from artificial grainy store treats, that"s why we switched.
customer_reviews.author: Susan F Karp

customer_reviews.title: ... cat adores these treats and I know they are good for her
customer_reviews.text: my cat adores these treats and I know they are good for her.
customer_reviews.author: Carmella R. Balbus

customer_reviews.title: Need to try
customer_reviews.text: Cats love it. A must have for cat owners haha
customer_reviews.author: Jenny Tian

customer_reviews.title: Cats Love Them
customer_reviews.text: We have five cats and they are just crazy about these treats.
customer_reviews.author: Ernie Y.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: very nutritious and great texture to help keep my cats teeth clean. My Cat loved the flavor.
customer_reviews.author: Howard Ladron

customer_reviews.title: Yummy!
customer_reviews.text: Jasmine loves this product and delivery was fast and accurate as promised.
customer_reviews.author: Janet Perens

customer_reviews.title: That my cat enjoys this product.
customer_reviews.text: This product is for my cat and she loves the treats.
customer_reviews.author: Gayle K. Hartsook

customer_reviews.title: Excellent healty treats
customer_reviews.text: Great treat for my kitten! He seems to love these treats!
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Luuv

customer_reviews.title: So small my cat just swallows them - no teeth cleaning benefit
customer_reviews.text: My cat likes these treats. Unfortunately they are so small that she doesn't chew them. Defeats the purpose of being crunchy... Plus ingredients contain citric acid and natural flavors, which are chemical flavor enhancers. I won't purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: JJB335

customer_reviews.title: My cat did not walk away!
customer_reviews.text: My companion is 18 years old and makes her mind up very quickly. She likes these, and has in the past walked away from other brands.
customer_reviews.author: SANDY

customer_reviews.title: blue buffalo wilderness grain free treats
customer_reviews.text: cat loves them and i feel good giving her healthy treats
customer_reviews.author: Don

product_meta.title: Blue Buffalo Wilderness Grain-Free Crunchy Cat Treat, 3 Flavor pack
feature_bullets: 1 package each of Chicken, Salmon, and Trout flavors
